sentences.en: A drunkard is unfit to drive.
He had a third examination and was declared unfit for duty.
sentences.cn: 他接受了第三次检查，被告知不宜上班。

sentences.en: He is physically unfit for this kind of work.
sentences.cn: 他干这种工作身体不行.

sentences.en: He was considered unfit to hold office because of moral turpitude.
sentences.cn: 为了道德上的可耻行为,他被认为不适担任公务员.

sentences.en: He was found to be mentally unfit to stand trial.
sentences.cn: 他被判定精神状况不宜接受审判。

sentences.en: He wished to join the army, but was rejected as medically unfit.
sentences.cn: 他想要参军, 但因体检不合格而未被批准.

sentences.en: His constant vacillation made him an unfit administrator.
sentences.cn: 他经常优柔寡断,这使他不适合当行政官员.

sentences.en: I know nothing about boxing, but I could see he was unfit, because he was puffing.
sentences.cn: 我对拳击一无所知，但我能看出他状态不佳，因为他在急促喘息。

sentences.en: Jenkins is unfit for public office.
sentences.cn: 詹金斯不适合担任公职。

sentences.en: Most of the wine was unfit for human consumption.
sentences.cn: 这些酒中大部分都不适于人类饮用。

sentences.en: Mr Abel's doctor has said he is unfit to travel.
sentences.cn: 埃布尔先生的医生说他不宜出行。

sentences.en: She never gets any exercise – she must be really unfit.
sentences.cn: 她从不锻炼——身体一定很不好。

sentences.en: The food was declared unfit for human consumption.
sentences.cn: 这种食品被宣布不适于人吃.

sentences.en: The food was unfit for human consumption.
The house was unfit for human habitation(= not good enough to live in ).
The housing was unfit for human habitation .
The meat was condemned as unfit for human consumption.
sentences.cn: 这种肉已被宣布不适宜人们食用.

trans.tran_cn: 不适宜的，不适当的，体格不佳的，不健康的
trans.tran_en: not in a good physical condition

trans.tran_cn: 使不合格；使不相宜；使不胜任
